numlitem.para: Oil tank is filled to recommended capacity before each departure,
There is no evidence of above normal oil consumption or leakage,
Associated ENG OIL PRESS and OIL TEMP indications are operative, and
Associated low ENG OIL PRESS light is operative.

placard.para: Placard near EICAS "L (R) OIL QTY INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Logbook at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)

numlitem.para: Fill affected engine oil tank, inspect engine exterior for signs of leakage.

note.para: Oil consumption averaging greater than one U.S. quart per hour of flight should be questioned.
